name: LoungeflySneeuwwitje: Cosplay Mini-rugzak met strikhandvat - Merchoid Nederland
description: Herinner jij je nog het verhaal van Sneeuwwitje en de zeven dwergen? x85;Je moet wonen onder een steen als je niet gehoord  van het. Nou, zelfs de boswezens kunnen hun vriend niet vergeten,  de eerlijkste van allemaal en ze helpen een helpende hand  om de moed erin te houden. En wat is een betere manier om dit te vieren? vriendschap dan met de XNUMXe Jubileumcollectie Loungefly Snow White 85th Anniversary Cosplay Mini Backpack? It's simply adorable and wrapped up with a bow just for you!This mini backpack is a tribute to the classic story that we all know and love. From the curious woodland creatures on the front to the sweet sentiment above Snow White on the back, anything from this collection will make you feel like you're a part of this magical world. And did we mention the coordinating inside lining? It features an 85th Anniversary Collection motif of Snow White and woodland creatures that will make you want to squeal with joy. But, let's talk about the details, shall we? We know it's not just about the looks, but it's what's on the inside that counts, too. The backpack is made of vegan leather (polyurethane) because we're all about being responsible and compassionate. The adjustable straps and pockets on either side make it practical for everyday use. But, let's not forget the enamel charm and gold-colored hardware and zipper that adds the perfect touch of elegance. And to make it an even more special find, this backpack is an officially licensed Disney product.The Snow White 85th Anniversary Collection Mini Backpack will not only complete any Disney outfit for you, but it will also make you feel like you're a part of the classic story. You can use it for your everyday essentials or even on your next trip to the Disney Parks. Either way, you'll be reminded of the woodland creatures that helped the fairest of them all, and it'll put a smile on your face. Bullet points:- Mini backpack tribute to Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs- Adorable woodland creature design with coordinating inside lining- Made of vegan leather (polyurethane) with adjustable straps and pockets on either side- Includes enamel charm and gold-colored hardware and zipper- Officially licensed Disney product- Dimensions: 9&rdquo; W x 10.5&rdquo; H x 4.5&rdquo; DProduct DetailsProduct type: Mini BackpackLicense: Snow WhiteManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 750 gram (26 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDBK2137GTIN: 671803403734
